name: Ubuntu (Termux)
install: pkg update -y && pkg install proot wget tar pulseaudio  -y &&  wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndronixApp/AndronixOrigin/master/Rootfs/Ubuntu19/ubuntu19.sh && chmod +x ubuntu19.sh && ./ubuntu19.sh
uninstall: pkg install wget -y && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndronixApp/AndronixOrigin/master/Uninstall/Ubuntu19/UNI-ubuntu19.sh && chmod +x UNI-ubuntu19.sh && ./UNI-ubuntu19.sh
discription: Ubuntu is a Debian-based Linux distributon sponsored by Canonical Ltd. considered to be a distribution suited for beginners. The OS is intended primarily for PC's though it can also be used on servers. It is the most beginner and user friendly, specifically designed for beginners and with easy to install packages using Software Store.

name: Kali Linux (Termux)
install: pkg install wget openssl-tool proot tar -y && hash -r && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Techriz/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Kali/kali.sh && bash kali.sh
discription: Kali Linux is a Debian-based Linux distribution aimed at advanced Penetration Testing and Security Auditing developed in collaboration with open source penetration testing software. It's one of the best OS's for hacking and penetration testing which contains all the necessary tools used by hackers. It is one of the best operating system for Hacking and Penetration testing. It contains all necessary tools used by the Hackers.

name: Debian (Termux)
install: pkg install wget openssl-tool proot tar -y && hash -r && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Techriz/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Debian/debian.sh && bash debian.sh
discription: Debian is a popular Linux distribution some of the most known Linux distros are based on which surpasses all other distros in package integration. Since all software is packaged by a coherent group, not only can all packages be found at a single site, but you can be assured that we have already worked out all issues regarding complicated dependencies. While we feel that the deb format has some advantages over the rpm format, it's the integration between the packages that makes a Debian system more robust.

name: Arch (Termux)
install: pkg install wget openssl-tool proot tar -y && hash -r && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Techriz/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Arch/armhf/arch.sh && bash arch.sh
discription: Arch Linux is a Linux distribution for computers based on x86–64 architectures. Arch Linux is composed predominantly of free and open-source software, and supports community involvement. Arch is largely based around binary packages. Arch strives to stay bleeding edge, and typically offers the latest stable versions of most software. Arch Linux uses its own Pacman package manager, which couples simple binary packages with an easy-to-use package build system.

name: Parrot Os (Termux)
install: pkg install wget openssl-tool proot tar -y && hash -r && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Techriz/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Parrot/parrot.sh &&  bash parrot.sh
discription: Parrot is a Linux distro based on Debian Testing edition and deigned with Security, Development and Privacy in mind. It includes a full portable laboratory for security and digital forensics experts, on the other hand it also includes everything you need to develop your own software or protect your privacy while surfing the net. It's a better, updated and more advanced alternative to Kali Linux. It has all the tools Kali Linux contains and also some additional tools specific to Parrot OS.

name: Fedora (Termux)
install: pkg install wget openssl-tool proot tar -y && hash -r && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Techriz/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Fedora/fedora.sh && bash fedora.sh
dev: Fedora Project (sponsored by Red Hat Inc.)
discription: Fedora is a distribution designed as a secure, general purpose OS which is sponsored by Red Hat and targets users who wants a reliable, user-friendly and powerful operating system. It comes with GNOME desktop environment by default but other DE's can be installed. The OS is developed on a six-month release cycle under Fedora Project.

name: Manjaro (Termux)
install: pkg install wget proot tar && wget https://andronixos.sfo2.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/Manjaro/manjaro.tar.xz && wget https://andronixos.sfo2.digitaloceanspaces.com/Manjaro/manjaro.sh && chmod +x manjaro.sh &&  chmod +x manjaro.tar.xz && ./manjaro.sh
discription: Manjaro is an accessible, friendly, open-source Linux distribution and community. Based on Arch Linux, providing all the benefits of cutting-edge software combined with a focus on getting started quickly, automated tools to require less manual intervention, and help readily available when needed. Manjaro is suitable for both newcomers and experienced Linux users.

name: Alpine (Termux)
install: pkg update -y && pkg install proot wget tar pulseaudio  -y &&  wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndronixApp/AndronixOrigin/master/Installer/Alpine/alpine.sh && chmod +x alpine.sh && ./alpine.sh
discription: Alpine Linux is a Linux distribution based on musl and BusyBox, designed for security, simplicity, and resource efficiency. It uses a hardened kernel and compiles all user-space binaries as position-independent executables with stack-smashing protection. Because of its small size, it's heavily used in containers providing quick boot-up times.
